the relationships that exist between two people, organizations, or countries, and whether these are good or bad: The meeting provided both sides with an opportunity to exchange views on the current state of U.S.-China relations. The government needs to build up better relations with private-sector providers.relations between sb (and sb) Local partnerships have worked well together, establishing good relations between employers and learning centres.
